subject: Ali express order 3066665990886870
description_text:
Hello,
I received my Vam pro motors from your AliExpress store, however the came with the wrong (older) mounting brackets. Couldyou send me the vertical mounting brackets?
Kind regards
Alan

conversations.body_text: Hi alan coffey,       Yes, please provide your order number.

It's okay I 3D printed some mounts, you can close the ticket thanks

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________
Hi alan coffey,  Okay, we're sorry. Please contact us through the buyer chat if you have any further questions.
